Un juego obligatorio para todo jugador de PC. Muy importante jugar al primero, eso sí.
Tiene un ritmo único en su especie y puzzles de portales como nunca has visto en otro juego.
Los personajes son pocos pero muy carismáticos, y el final es de los más épicos vistos en los últimos tiempos en videojuegos.

Bu oyunu duymayan yoktur sanıyorum. Özellikle ikinci oyunla beraber oldukça populerlik kazanan birinci şahıs kamerasıyla oyunan platform bulmaca oyunu portal, bence gelmiş geçmiş en yaratıcı fikirli oyunlardan birisi. Basit bir fikir gibi gözükse de portallar açarak bulmacaları çözdüğünüz bu oyun inanılmaz eğlenceli. Bence Portal ve Portal 2 yi, oyun oynabilen herkes oynamalı.

The only best Valve game so far.

Me encantó este juego, es una pena que no se continue con la historia, pero es un gran juego y con giros en la trama bastante interesante.

Если первая часть Portal вышла скорее как эскеримент, то вторая получилась полноценной изумительной игрой с развитием идей первоначальницы и добавлением кучи игровых механик. Любителям головоломок обязательно к ознакомлению.

Být více takových her, svět by se stal lepším místem. Postrčit k přemýšlení do hloubky a v souvislostech, vnímání estetiky, posílení logiky, snaha o vytvoření něčeho pro jiné, smysl spolupráce... to vše nemusí jen škola, zmůže to jak vidno i hra.A to sakra dobře.
Amazing puzzle game both in solo and with friends!

Portal 2 is a great sequel to a great game. It is even better than the first game, Portal. It plays like Portal, in which you use a gun that fires 2 portals to solve puzzles and progress through the facility. This game focuses on the story of the Portal universe (which is also seemingly the same as the Half-Life universe) more than the first Portal did, and you can see much more of the facility and the behind-the-scenes areas than you can in Portal. The puzzles are fun and many are challenging, and the games story is great too. The game also has a 2-player mode, a level creator, and workshop support for levels, making this game a great game to play with a friend. Some of the workshop levels use external tools as well, making for some crazy and complex puzzles or minigames.
